backend/main.mo: Defines the Ribbit canister with extensive state maps for ponds, posts, ribbits, users, tags, likes, activities, and storage, along with core type definitions.
backend/migration.mo: Provides a placeholder migration module that returns the old actor unchanged.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report with no listed features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists prewritten summaries of all frontend files for documentation or reference.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide explaining prerequisites and steps to build and deploy the app on the Internet Computer.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry file loading the frontend root element and main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/scripts/combined-update.sh: Shell script automating backend binding generation, frontend build, and canister deployment with error handling.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app setting up routes, global theme, Froggy Phrase initialization, and layout structure.
frontend/src/components/BookmarkButton.t: Bookmark toggle button component using bookmark state from useBookmarks.
frontend/src/components/CommentItem.tsx: Displays a comment with avatar, timestamp, content, and optional like/reply actions.
frontend/src/components/EmojiReactions.t: Interactive emoji reaction bar allowing users to react with predefined emojis and view counts.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with navigation links and attribution text including caffeine.ai branding.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar handling search, user avatar, mobile sidebar toggle, and responsive search UI.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Page layout wrapper including header, footer, routed content, and mobile sidebar drawer control.
frontend/src/components/LeftSidebar.tsx: Sidebar showing navigation links and recent activities with route-aware highlighting.
frontend/src/components/LilyCard.tsx: Displays a post preview with avatar, metadata, image, and interaction buttons like likes and share.
frontend/src/components/LilyImageFrame.t: Image container that preserves 4:3 aspect ratio and adds blurred backdrop for non‑standard image sizes.
frontend/src/components/MobileLeftSideba: Mobile drawer wrapper for the left sidebar with scroll locking and overlay handling.
frontend/src/components/PondAboutSidebar: Shows pond details, stats, moderators, and join/leave controls with loading states.
frontend/src/components/PondCardJoinCont: Join button logic for pond cards with mutation handling and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/PondMobileHeader: Mobile header showing pond banner, profile info, and navigation tabs.
frontend/src/components/PostCard.tsx: Card component displaying a post with voting, metadata, preview content, image, tags, and comment/view counts.
frontend/src/components/ProfileRibbitIte: Displays a user's ribbit with avatar, timestamp, content, and link to the related lily conversation.
Popover emoji picker allowing quick emoji insertion via buttons.
frontend/src/components/RibbitItem.tsx: Ribbit comment item with nesting, liking, replying, and avatar loading behavior.
frontend/src/components/RibbitMiniBlurAv: Progressively loads and transitions avatar images using a tiny blurred placeholder.
frontend/src/components/RightSidebar.tsx: Right sidebar showing trending ponds, popular tags, and popular recent posts with loading states.
frontend/src/components/search/MobileSea: Implements a full‑screen mobile search modal showing trending searches and suggestions with query input handling.
frontend/src/components/search/SearchDro: Renders a dropdown under a search bar showing trending searches or suggestions based on the current query.
frontend/src/components/TagHubRightSideb: Sidebar listing top, trending, and newest tags using stat modules with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/UnderlineTabs.ts: Provides wrapper components for tab lists and triggers with underline-specific styling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBookmarks.ts: Manages bookmarked lily IDs with localStorage persistence and helpers to add, remove, or toggle bookmarks.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebounce.ts: Provides a debounced version of a value that updates after a delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements a React context for Internet Identity authentication, loading identities, logging in, and clearing state.
frontend/src/hooks/useMediaQuery.ts: Tracks whether a CSS media query matches and updates reactively on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for ponds, users, and other backend data, using the actor for fetching and mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base/styles, color variables for light/dark themes, and custom utility classes for UI elements.
frontend/src/lib/formatNumber.ts: Formats large numbers into short notation like k, M, or B with simple rounding.
frontend/src/lib/froggyPhraseWordList.ts: Exports frog‑related terms and a large word list used for Froggy Phrase generation.
frontend/src/lib/imageCompression.ts: Client‑side utility for validating, resizing, and compressing images with GIF animation detection.
frontend/src/lib/pondNameValidation.ts: Provides alphanumeric validation, normalization, and error messaging for pond names.
frontend/src/lib/pondRank.ts: Sorts ponds by stats and assigns deterministic ranks using lilyCount, memberCount, and name.
frontend/src/lib/shareLily.ts: Shares a lily URL via Web Share API or clipboard with toasts for feedback.
frontend/src/lib/tagValidation.ts: Validates and normalizes alphanumeric tags and returns user-friendly error messages.
frontend/src/lib/user.ts: Manages usernames, IDs, Froggy Phrase generation, and localStorage‑based user settings.
frontend/src/lib/viewCountCooldown.ts: Implements per‑lily view cooldown tracking using timestamps in localStorage.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Static about page describing the platform, its features, and community guidelines.
frontend/src/pages/AllPondsPage.tsx: Lists all ponds with loading states, rank indicators, join controls, and navigation to pond details.
frontend/src/pages/CreateLilyPage.tsx: Form for creating lilies with support for text, image, and link types, tag suggestions, and image compression.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePondPage.tsx: Form for creating ponds including name validation, descriptions, optional images with compression, and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePostPage.tsx: Form for creating posts of various types with image compression, pond selection, and submission validation.
frontend/src/pages/FrogProfilePage.tsx: Renders a user profile page showing avatar, bio info, posts, and comments with loading and not‑found states.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the main feed of lilies with sorting, search support, sidebars, and loading skeletons.
frontend/src/pages/LilyPage.tsx: Shows a single lily post with comments, likes, view tracking, and ribbit creation UI.
frontend/src/pages/PondAboutPage.tsx: Provides an about page for a pond with details, moderators, join/leave actions, and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/PondPage.tsx: Displays a pond’s feed of lilies with sorting, sidebars, banner, and not‑found handling.
frontend/src/pages/PostPage.tsx: Renders a full post view with metadata, content, image, comments, and a form to submit new comments using query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/SavedLiliesPage.tsx: Displays locally bookmarked lilies, loading each via ID and allowing removal from bookmarks.
frontend/src/pages/TagHubPage.tsx: Shows top, trending, and newest tags with stats, using tabs and query hooks to load tag lists.
frontend/src/pages/TagPage.tsx: Displays lilies for a specific tag with sorting, canonical tag redirects, and subcategory listings.
frontend/src/pages/UserSettingsPage.tsx: Provides user settings including username changes, profile editing, avatar upload, pond membership, and admin tools.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme colors, radii, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, including issues with AccessControl authorization and several pending feature requests to neutralize permission checks and auto-join pond creators. Contains notes, known issues, and metadata for build planning.
